unnormalised: Paytm is offering cashback of ₹50 on your 1st UPI transaction this month! Just make sure it's a min. amount of Rs. 99. This is valid till 31/12/2024. Nice, right?
normalised: Paytm is offering cashback of rupee fifty on your first U-P-I transaction this month! Just make sure it's a minimum amount of rupee ninety nine. This is valid till thirty first december two thousand and twenty four. Nice, right?

unnormalised: Amazon is also running a sale. Get up to 60% off on electronics and an instant 10% discount on HDFC bank cards. Prices are starting from just ₹499. Offer ends on 20/11/2024, so hurry up!
normalised: Amazon is also running a sale. Get up to sixty percent off on electronics and an instant ten percent discount on H-D-F-C bank cards. Prices are starting from just rupee four hundred and ninety nine. Offer ends on twentieth november two thousand and twenty four, so hurry up!

unnormalised: Flipkart's Big Billion Days sale was a hit! They saw transactions worth ₹10,000 crore in just 5 days. Wowza! Now, they're teasing a Diwali sale with even bigger discounts. Expect deals starting from Rs. 99.
normalised: Flipkart's Big Billion Days sale was a hit! They saw transactions worth rupee ten thousand crore in just five days. Wowza! Now, they're teasing a Diwali sale with even bigger discounts. Expect deals starting from rupee ninety nine.

unnormalised: Looks like everyone wants a piece of the pie. Even my local kirana store now accepts Paytm and Google Pay! And they're offering a 2% discount on online payments. What a time to be alive!
normalised: Looks like everyone wants a piece of the pie. Even my local kirana store now accepts Paytm and Google Pay! And they're offering a two percent discount on online payments. What a time to be alive!
